title: Be Strong and Courageous
summary: Joshua 1 begins with God commissioning Joshua after Mosesâ€™ death. God commands him to be strong and courageous, promising to be with him as he leads Israel into the Promised Land.

faq.question: What command does God repeatedly give Joshua?
What promise does God make?
faq.answer: That He will be with Joshua wherever he goes, just as He was with Moses.
